content: 1 Tomato sauce I'm at a loss I simply don't know why Hardly ever, really never Spots a worn out tie But wear a new one, a costly blue one A fancy silken job If you're like me;
2 There's a Polar Bear In our Frigidaire-- He likes it 'cause it's cold in there. With his seat in the meat
3 The great Overdog That heavenly beast With a star in one eye Gives a leap in the east. He dances upright All the way to the west And never once drops On his forefeet to rest.
4 Oft in the silence of the night, When the lonely moon rides high, When wintry winds are whistling
5 Last night I held a lovely hand, It was so small and neat, I thought my heart with joy would burst So wild was every beat.
